main event: Three observers reported seeing a green object with an orange trail in Colorado, which was much brighter than jet exhaust.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in the vicinity of Colorado Springs and Denver on December 11, 1955., The observation lasted for only 3-5 seconds., The object was identified as a meteor by the USAF, which is considered false by the witnesses., The reports came from both military and civilian sources., All three observers had the same description of the object.
sighted object: one green object with an orange trail
location: Colorado Springs and Denver, Colorado, USA
